conversation.message: Hello Parent_A. We understand that the transition process is crucial for both the child and the family, and we take great care in making it smooth and positive. Our process is highly individualized, but typically involves a phased entry system. We start with short, supervised visits for the child and a parent/guardian prior to the official start date, allowing the child to familiarize themselves with the environment and staff while having their trusted adult nearby. During the initial weeks, we assign a primary caregiver who focuses intensively on building a secure attachment with your child, ensuring rapid integration and comfort. We maintain daily, detailed communication with you during this period to share observations and coordinate strategies, adjusting the schedule as needed based on your child's temperament and needs. Our goal is a gentle, trusting start that sets a secure foundation for their entire time with us. We remain very eager to welcome your family!
